name: Travails of Ouffa-yee
description:
a demo for a bump rpg idea I had, made during the 666ames made quick jam! Run into enemies to fight them, run into everything else to see what it does (possibly unexplained? this is a demo giggle)

full version (possibly imaginary) can have music, lots more caves and enemies, an ending, a story, etc etc <3 made this in a relaxed way
